ygData.subject: Re: Strange rune
ygData.msgSnippet: This rune is used for the Centaur armor in South karanas - I thnk ye should get all three parts in Runnyeye.
ygData.messageBody:
This rune is used for the Centaur armor in South
karanas - I thnk ye should get all three parts in
Runnyeye.


--- Dominic Marier <hobitus@...> wrote:
> From: "Dominic Marier" <hobitus@...>
>
> Hi,
> in my travel i have come across a strange rune.
> it's 3 pieces of a
> broken rune. if i cast identify on it, it says Rune
> of Dwarf (bottom), and
> Rune of Dwarf (Middle). i'm still searching for the
> top piece. i wonder
> which spell the rune of dwarf is used for and how to
> repair the rune ( maybe
> hit combine in the lexicon?). i've found those 2
> rune on the evil eye in
> runnyeye ( not in beholder). Anyone got information
> on this?
>
>
> Gydgith Lightweaver, Bristlebane
